entry.title: They May Have Fallen But We Still Stand
entry.summary:
Author: Effra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,716Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 9

Summary: It’s the end of the war and to Lieutenant Stiles Stilinski, it feels as if everyone is celebrating except for him. Perhaps it is the faces that swim behind his eyelids, lost to time and musket balls. Or perhaps it is the doubt he harbours in his heart that he can truly be good at anything but soldiering.Regardless, he huddles at one end of the bar, nursing an ale barely worth the name and listening while the locals sing their songs and toast to fallen soldiers. He doesn't think about the men lost from his own rifle regiment, and he definitely doesn't think about alpha Lord Hale of Triskele, last seen leaping into battle with typical reckless heroism. Because even if he had survived the battle, nothing could or would ever happen between them. They were from two different worlds.

entry.title: Extra Credit: A Sterek Story
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,089Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: Stiles Stilinski never expected one little accident to land him in *this* kind of trouble. When a condom falls out of his bag in the middle of Professor Hale’s lecture, it earns him a sharp look and a very firm, *Mr. Stilinski, can you please stay after class?*What follows is a lesson in control, consequences, and just how much authority Derek is willing to wield behind closed doors. Stiles, ever the overachiever, is more than happy to prove he’s worthy of *extra credit*—and Derek? Well, let’s just say he’s more than willing to provide a *very* thorough evaluation.By the time Stiles saunters out of Derek’s office, thoroughly wrecked and completely satisfied, he’s already planning his next *accidental* disruption.After all, learning is an ongoing process.

entry.summary:
Author: TMRCookie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,135Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 100

Summary: "Hey, where are you? There is a pack meeting." Scott asked."Scotty, something came up.""What?" Scott asked again."They found him." There was silence on the other side of line."You mean they found...""Yeah. They found Thomas." Stiles said.Stiles was living his life when he got a call, one that he wished but never thought would happen. entry.title: Renaissance in ruins
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,207Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 76

Summary: Stiles returns to Beacon Hills after years of disappearance. He brings with him a child, but something is different. His presence is marked by a silent pain, a weight that the pack can't ignore.Derek quickly notices that Stiles is no longer the same. There’s something in his behavior, in his gaze, that hides a dark past. But what happened to him? What is he trying to hide?The pack, still hurt by Stiles' sudden departure, doesn’t know how to deal with his return. Stiles’ secrets begin to surface, and with them, a truth no one expected.And, in the midst of it all, Derek starts to wonder: is what happened to Stiles something that can be healed? Or is he already lost forever?

entry.title: Iron Gilded Void
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,991Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 368

Summary: Things fall apart for Stiles in Beacon Hills and he and the Hale men in his life end up with his uncles in New York City. "Guys, it's fine," Stiles said, stepping forward. "Stiles, it’s not fine!" Derek snapped, not taking his eyes off James. "Do you fucking know who that is?!" Stiles blinked at him, then at Peter, whose entire body was coiled so tightly he looked ready to launch himself at James at any second. With a sigh, Stiles rubbed his face. “Yes. That’s Uncle James.”
